channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HBASE-14684] Try to remove all MiniMapReduceCluster in unit tests
item.description:
As discussion in dev list, we will try to do MR job without MiniMapReduceCluster.

Testcases will run faster and more reliable.
item.summary: Try to remove all MiniMapReduceCluster in unit tests

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

Test results: https://builds.apache.org/job/PreCommit-HBASE-Build/16195//testReport/
Release Findbugs (version 2.0.3) warnings: https://builds.apache.org/job/PreCommit-HBASE-Build/16195//artifact/patchprocess/newFindbugsWarnings.html
Checkstyle Errors: https://builds.apache.org/job/PreCommit-HBASE-Build/16195//artifact/patchprocess/checkstyle-aggregate.html

Console output: https://builds.apache.org/job/PreCommit-HBASE-Build/16195//console

This message is automatically generated.

We can see with this patch, testcase run much faster.
especially for org.apache.hadoop.hbase.mapreduce, we can see it costs only 26 minutes.
https://builds.apache.org/job/PreCommit-HBASE-Build/16195/testReport/

But without this patch, org.apache.hadoop.hbase.mapreduce costs 76 minutes....
https://builds.apache.org/job/PreCommit-HBASE-Build/16191/testReport/
That is pretty amazing. Fine by me. +1 Letting the issue hang out for a while in case there are other opinions on our stripping of mr clusters from test.
+1 from me this is awesome.
I just went and pushed this to master. If you do a branch-1 patch Heng Chen I'll push it there too. Nice one.

I reverted this. Since it went in TRUNK has gone red with either of these failing:

org.apache.hadoop.hbase.snapshot.TestMobExportSnapshot.testExportRetry

or

org.apache.hadoop.hbase.snapshot.TestExportSnapshot.testExportRetry

(which is probably the same test going by Matteo's recent archeology...)

This history view is good for perspective:

https://builds.apache.org/view/H-L/view/HBase/job/HBase-TRUNK/6948/testReport/junit/org.apache.hadoop.hbase.snapshot/TestMobSecureExportSnapshot/testExportRetry/history/

So, I could put back the patch leaving the mini MR in place for just these two tests... for now.

Doing revert because want trunk blue again.
Marking this patch critical. Looking at trunk builds while it was in place, the build time went from close to 3 hours to instead be close to 2 hours (2 hrs and 40 odd minutes vs 1 hr 50 minutes...)
